page.title: 08RECREATIONAL FACILITIES
page.content: ADULTS HORSE RIDING-many riding stables, particularly in Seaton. LIBRARY- on Oxford St. Here books, video-tapes, record and tapes can be borrowed, computer used, local history section, etc. RITZ CINEMA-on Murray Rd. Presents popular films in 3 studios. THEATRE- Theatre Royal in Washington St.Presents 5 public plays plus several others to members of the club. GYMNASIUM- Ted's Gym is a health studio for body building. On John St. AMUSEMENT ARCADE-on Finkle St.Space invader and gambling machines. BINGO- several, but mainly in Opera House. DISCO-'Rumours'-drink and dance. PUBS AND CLUBS- large variety. COLLEGE-vocational and recreational courses on wide variety of subjects.
